data.title: Concept Financial Services Group
data.meta_description: CFSG is a family owned Australian financial services group established in 1991 specialising in M&A, capital raisings and direct investment.
data.text:
Mr Marcus H. Rose

Founder and Principal (FFin, AREI, FAICD, MBA)

Marcus is Executive Chairman and founder of the Concept Financial Services Group.

Marcus is one of Australia’s foremost investment bankers. He has specialist skills in technical and security analysis and has over 30 years of professional experience in capital markets. Marcus has advised and acted on behalf of major Australian and international companies and has been responsible for a substantial number of successful merger, acquisition and takeover transactions, debt and equity capital raisings and initial public offerings.

Marcus has extensive corporate experience having served on the boards of various listed public companies and numerous private companies. He has also acted as an advisor and board member to superannuation funds, charitable organisations, sporting clubs and a political party.

Marcus is a Fellow of the Financial Services Institute of Australasia, an Associate of the Real Estate Institute of Australia, and a Fellow of the Australian Institute of Company Directors.

Mr Chris Wookey

(B.Bus (Accounting), M.Tax CA)

Chris has over 30 years of taxation law experience providing high-level corporate and international tax advice to clients including large multinationals as well as privately owned businesses, their owners and high net worth individuals.

He was most recently a Principal in the Tax Division of Deloitte Private and prior to that was a partner in the Tax Consulting Division of GMK Partners. Chris’ main areas of expertise include the Australian tax treatment of business acquisitions and disposals, capital gains, superannuation and SME-specific issues such as Division 7A, the taxation of trusts and small business CGT concessions as well as cross-border trade and investment. Chris is also an experienced speaker for The Tax Institute and regularly presents at professional seminars, conventions and conferences.

Professor John A. Rickard

(BSc,PhD (London),C.Math, FIMA, FAIM, FANZAM)

Professor Rickard was Vice-Chancellor, Southern Cross University NSW and has previously held senior positions at both Monash and Melbourne Universities as well as having been a visiting Professor at Cranfield University and the London Business School.

Professor Rickard has had extensive consulting experience to both the public and private sectors having specialised in complex problem solving and strategic advice.

Professor Rickard has authored a series of books including “Borrowing and Lending Money” and “Statistics for Business and Economics”. He is a Fellow of the Institute of Mathematics and its Applications, Fellow of the Australian Institute of Management and a Fellow of the Australian and New Zealand Academy of Management.

Professor Rickard has had an involvement with the Concept Financial Services Group since its inception.

Mr Eden S. Rose

(B.Bus, BA)

Eden is a securities analyst, trader and asset manager with specialist skills in technical trading and investment. Prior to joining CFSG, Eden had extensive experience working for some of the world’s largest media companies including News Corporation and Clear Channel. During his time with those organisations he worked on high-profile media brands including the Herald-Sun, The Australian, The Weekly Times and AdShel. He has worked in both Australia and the United Kingdom. Eden has completed a number of successful direct investments and is an investment manager responsible for the group’s trading portfolio and investment holdings.

Eden has a business degree from Monash University and an Arts degree from the University of Melbourne.

Mr Jason J. Rose

(M. Appl. Fin, BA, B. Comm)

Jason specialises in mergers and acquisitions as well as investment analysis. His skills extend to developing highly sophisticated financial models and forecasting tools. Jason commenced his professional career in the audit division of KPMG where he focused on clients within the manufacturing and financial services sectors. He then moved into the media and advertising industries where his clients spanned various sectors including retail, banking, consumer products, utilities and travel. He has a particular interest in innovative and high-growth companies and is a regular writer on the subject. Jason has been involved in a number of successful direct investments and transactions.

Jason has degrees in Commerce and Arts from Monash University and a Masters degree in Applied Finance & Investment from the Financial Services Institute of Australasia.

Ms Lisa Will

(B.Bus, CA)

Lisa is a qualified Chartered Accountant who holds a Bachelor of Business degree and is the group’s Chief Financial Officer. Her functions include general accounting, management reporting, tax and audit. Lisa has been with Concept for over 10-years and was previously with BDO.
